variables.label: Activepieces Version
variables.description: Check out their Docker page for the valid tags https://hub.docker.com/r/activepieces/activepieces/tags

instructions.start: This is a simple setup. For more advanced setup please check their repository and adjust app accordingly
instructions.end: Please wait for 2 minutes. Activepieces is deployed and available as $$cap_appname, please change AP_FRONTEND_URL when you force https

description: Your friendliest open source all-in-one automation tool, designed to be extensible through a type-safe pieces framework written in Typescript.
